48  enum ShapeOptions {
49  kUseMiter = 1, //Whether or not to use miter joins on line segments(makes lines prettier, with minimal cost)
50  kConstantScreenThickness = 2 // Whether or not to use perspective divide on line thickness
51  };
52 
53  enum EffectOptions {
54  kFadeWithDistance = 1
55  };
56 
57 
59 
60  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
63  Lines();
64  virtual ~Lines();
66 
67  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
70 
71  bool useMiter() const {
72  return m_shapeOptions.testFlag(kUseMiter);
73  }
74 
75  inline void setUseMiter(bool useMiter) {
76  m_shapeOptions.setFlag(kUseMiter, useMiter);
77  }
78 
79  inline void setConstantScreenThickness(bool constant) {
80  m_shapeOptions.setFlag(kConstantScreenThickness, constant);
81  }
82 
83  inline void setFadeWithDistance(bool fade) {
84  m_effectOptions.setFlag(kFadeWithDistance, fade);
85  }
